hypothesis_content.title: Fade the 'Bounce Off Support' Narrative in Bear/Stress Regimes
hypothesis_content.statement: In BEAR or STRESS regimes, when price bounces +5% or more from a recent low (e.g., $85K as mentioned) and major news headlines (like the provided example) frame it as a 'contrarian buy signal' or 'strong support bounce,' the bounce will fail and price will retest or break the prior low within the next 5-7 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In bearish regimes, rallies are often short-covering events or dead cat bounces. When mainstream or social media quickly labels a bounce as a new buying opportunity, it often signals that the 'dumb money' is being drawn in near a local top, just before the dominant downtrend resumes. This is the essence of contrarian news flow analysis.
entry_conditions: BTC price has a 3-day rally of >= +5% from a 7-day low
News Sentiment Score (headline analysis) for the subsequent 24h shows a dominant narrative of 'buying the dip,' 'support holding,' or 'contrarian opportunity'
BTC daily RSI (14) remains below 60 after the bounce
Entry on a 4-hour close below the opening price of the first 4-hour candle after the news condition is flagged

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price declines to within 0.5% of the prior 7-day low
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price closes above the high of the initial 3-day bounce candle on a 4-hour timeframe

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If price, after such a signaled bounce and news narrative, continues to rally and sustains above the bounce high more than 60% of the time, the hypothesis is wrong.
